posts.postText:
So I decided to post why I have lag, cuz Im bored.

So I live In a rural area, cant even get cable, so we decide to get a mobile hotspot stick thingy, usb plug.
We have multiple computers, and cant connect all at once, so we get a router, and plug the stick into that.
Router ends up working fine, 4 computers hooked up to it, along with a wii, xbox360, and a ps3, and ipods.
Router works well, for about a year, then the internet stops being recieved, but the router still gives out a signal.
We get a new router, but it doesnt have a usb plug for the stick.
So we have to wire the first broken router, to the new one, with the usb plugged in.


 TL;DR: 
I lag cuz I have a mobile stick plugged into a router, wired to another router, with many many devices hooked up to it. Wireless, and wired.
